name: From Beyond The Grave Cafe
description:
Work in a cafe serving up spooky drinks with latte art to ghoulish patrons! 

I made this during the Darktober Game Jam using Godot. It's my second game so far so I'm proud of the different things I was able to implement for this. It was a great learning experience even if I was not able to add all the features I wanted by the deadline. Feel free to play and give any feedback or comment. The game is not very long and there may be some bugs here and there.

Music:

Shop Theme by Cleyton Kauffman - http://opengameart.org/users/doppelganger

Running Water by Arthur - https://opengameart.org/content/running-water
